value.name: Where is Hailey Poland Now?
value.description: Kevin Neal went on a rampage in the secluded community of Rancho Tehama in California, which ended with five people being killed and many more injured. But months before that, Hailey Poland had survived a vicious attack at his hands and worried that things would only get worse from there.
